content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Soul-Crushing Blow The target is doomed 1 and is stupefied 1 for as long as it is doomed.

Bludgeoning
Knockback The target is pushed 10 feet.

Piercing
Armor Damage The target's armor also takes the damage (applying the armor's Hardness normally).

Slashing
Draining Strike The target loses one random prepared spell or spell slot, as determined by the GM.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #39
